absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

accelerock.name: Accelerock
accelerock.desc: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

acid-armor.name: Acid Armor
acid-armor.desc: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

acid-spray.name: Acid Spray
acid-spray.desc: The user attacks by spitting fluid that works to melt the target. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

acid.name: Acid
acid.desc: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.desc: The user nimbly strikes the target. This attack does massive damage if the user isn't holding an item.

acupressure.name: Acupressure
acupressure.desc: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.

aerial-ace.name: Aerial Ace
aerial-ace.desc: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
aeroblast.desc: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

after-you.name: After You
after-you.desc: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

agility.name: Agility
agility.desc: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply boosts its Speed stat.

air-cutter.name: Air Cutter
air-cutter.desc: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

air-slash.name: Air Slash
air-slash.desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

alluring-voice.name: Alluring Voice
alluring-voice.desc: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.

ally-switch.name: Ally Switch
ally-switch.desc: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.desc: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

ancient-power.name: Ancient Power
ancient-power.desc: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also boost all the user's stats at once.

apple-acid.name: Apple Acid
apple-acid.desc: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

aqua-cutter.name: Aqua Cutter
aqua-cutter.desc: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

aqua-jet.name: Aqua Jet
aqua-jet.desc: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

aqua-ring.name: Aqua Ring
aqua-ring.desc: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

aqua-step.name: Aqua Step
aqua-step.desc: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

aqua-tail.name: Aqua Tail
aqua-tail.desc: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

arm-thrust.name: Arm Thrust
arm-thrust.desc: The user attacks the target with open-palmed arm thrusts. This move hits two to five times in a row.

armor-cannon.name: Armor Cannon
armor-cannon.desc: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

aromatic-mist.name: Aromatic Mist
aromatic-mist.desc: The user boosts the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

assurance.name: Assurance
assurance.desc: This move's power is doubled if the target has already taken some damage in the same turn.

astonish.name: Astonish
astonish.desc: The user attacks the target by crying out in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

astral-barrage.name: Astral Barrage
astral-barrage.desc: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

attack-order.name: Attack Order
attack-order.desc: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

attract.name: Attract
attract.desc: If the target is of the opposite gender to the user, it becomes infatuated with the user and will sometimes be unable to use its moves.

aura-sphere.name: Aura Sphere
aura-sphere.desc: The user lets loose a pulse of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

aura-wheel.name: Aura Wheel
aura-wheel.desc: Morpeko attacks and boosts its Speed stat with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.

aurora-beam.name: Aurora Beam
aurora-beam.desc: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

aurora-veil.name: Aurora Veil
aurora-veil.desc: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only when it is snowing.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.desc: This move's power is doubled if the target has inflicted damage on the user in the same turn.

axe-kick.name: Axe Kick
axe-kick.desc: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

baby-doll-eyes.name: Baby-doll Eyes
baby-doll-eyes.desc: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.

baneful-bunker.name: Baneful Bunker
baneful-bunker.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

barb-barrage.name: Barb Barrage
barb-barrage.desc: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move's power is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

baton-pass.name: Baton Pass
baton-pass.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

beak-blast.name: Beak Blast
beak-blast.desc: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the user while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

beat-up.name: Beat Up
beat-up.desc: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

belch.name: Belch
belch.desc: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

belly-drum.name: Belly Drum
belly-drum.desc: The user maximizes its Attack stat but loses HP equal to half its max HP.

bind.name: Bind
bind.desc: A long body, tentacles, or the like are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

bite.name: Bite
bite.desc: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

bitter-blade.name: Bitter Blade
bitter-blade.desc: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

bitter-malice.name: Bitter Malice
bitter-malice.desc: The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

blast-burn.name: Blast Burn
blast-burn.desc: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can't move on the next turn.

blaze-kick.name: Blaze Kick
blaze-kick.desc: The user launches a kick that has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit. This may also leave the target with a burn.

bleakwind-storm.name: Bleakwind Storm
bleakwind-storm.desc: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also lower the Speed stats of opposing Pokémon.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.desc: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

block.name: Block
block.desc: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent the target from fleeing.

blood-moon.name: Blood Moon
blood-moon.desc: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a full moon that shines as red as blood. This move can't be used twice in a row.

blue-flare.name: Blue Flare
blue-flare.desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

body-press.name: Body Press
body-press.desc: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense stat, the greater the damage this move deals.

body-slam.name: Body Slam
body-slam.desc: The user attacks by dropping onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

bolt-strike.name: Bolt Strike
bolt-strike.desc: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

bone-rush.name: Bone Rush
bone-rush.desc: The user attacks by striking the target with a hard bone. This move hits two to five times in a row.

boomburst.name: Boomburst
boomburst.desc: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible explosive sound.

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.desc: The user bounces up high on the first turn, then drops onto the target on the next turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

branch-poke.name: Branch Poke
branch-poke.desc: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

brave-bird.name: Brave Bird
brave-bird.desc: The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

breaking-swipe.name: Breaking Swipe
breaking-swipe.desc: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

brick-break.name: Brick Break
brick-break.desc: The user attacks with a swift chop. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

brine.name: Brine
brine.desc: This move's power is doubled if the target's HP is at half or less.

brutal-swing.name: Brutal Swing
brutal-swing.desc: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

bubble-beam.name: Bubble Beam
bubble-beam.desc: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

bug-bite.name: Bug Bite
bug-bite.desc: The user attacks by biting the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

bug-buzz.name: Bug Buzz
bug-buzz.desc: The user vibrates to generate a damaging sound wave. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

bulk-up.name: Bulk Up
bulk-up.desc: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting its Attack and Defense stats.

bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
bulldoze.desc: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

bullet-punch.name: Bullet Punch
bullet-punch.desc: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

bullet-seed.name: Bullet Seed
bullet-seed.desc: The user attacks by forcefully shooting seeds at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

burning-bulwark.name: Burning Bulwark
burning-bulwark.desc: The user's intensely hot fur protects it from attacks and also burns any attacker that makes direct contact with it.

burning-jealousy.name: Burning Jealousy
burning-jealousy.desc: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

calm-mind.name: Calm Mind
calm-mind.desc: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to boost its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

ceaseless-edge.name: Ceaseless Edge
ceaseless-edge.desc: The user slashes its shell blade at the target. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.

celebrate.name: Celebrate
celebrate.desc: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

charge-beam.name: Charge Beam
charge-beam.desc: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The residual electricity may also boost the user's Sp. Atk stat.

charge.name: Charge
charge.desc: The user becomes charged, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move it uses. This also boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.

chilling-water.name: Chilling Water
chilling-water.desc: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that's so cold it saps the target's power. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

chilly-reception.name: Chilly Reception
chilly-reception.desc: The user tells a chillingly bad joke before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting. This summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

chloroblast.name: Chloroblast
chloroblast.desc: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.

circle-throw.name: Circle Throw
circle-throw.desc: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

clanging-scales.name: Clanging Scales
clanging-scales.desc: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat is lowered after the attack.

clangorous-soul.name: Clangorous Soul
clangorous-soul.desc: The user boosts all its stats by using some of its own HP.

clear-smog.name: Clear Smog
clear-smog.desc: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

close-combat.name: Close Combat
close-combat.desc: The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

coaching.name: Coaching
coaching.desc: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

coil.name: Coil
coil.desc: The user coils up and concentrates. This boosts its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

collision-course.name: Collision Course
collision-course.desc: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

comeuppance.name: Comeuppance
comeuppance.desc: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

confide.name: Confide
confide.desc: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

confuse-ray.name: Confuse Ray
confuse-ray.desc: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes confusion.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.desc: The target is hit with a weak telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also confuse the target.

conversion-2.name: Conversion 2
conversion-2.desc: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the move the target used last.

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.desc: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.desc: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. This move fails if no other move has been used yet.

cosmic-power.name: Cosmic Power
cosmic-power.desc: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to boost its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

cotton-guard.name: Cotton Guard
cotton-guard.desc: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically boosting its Defense stat.

cotton-spore.name: Cotton Spore
cotton-spore.desc: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon. This harshly lowers their Speed stats.

counter.name: Counter
counter.desc: A retaliatory attack that counters any physical move, inflicting double the damage taken.

court-change.name: Court Change
court-change.desc: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

covet.name: Covet
covet.desc: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.desc: The target is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

cross-chop.name: Cross Chop
cross-chop.desc: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

cross-poison.name: Cross Poison
cross-poison.desc: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.desc: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

crush-claw.name: Crush Claw
crush-claw.desc: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

crush-grip.name: Crush Grip
crush-grip.desc: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

curse.name: Curse
curse.desc: A move that has different effects depending on whether the user is a Ghost type or not.

dark-pulse.name: Dark Pulse
dark-pulse.desc: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with ill intent. This may also make the target flinch.

dark-void.name: Dark Void
dark-void.desc: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that puts them to sleep.

darkest-lariat.name: Darkest Lariat
darkest-lariat.desc: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

dazzling-gleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
dazzling-gleam.desc: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

decorate.name: Decorate
decorate.desc: The user sharply boosts the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

defend-order.name: Defend Order
defend-order.desc: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, boosting its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

defense-curl.name: Defense Curl
defense-curl.desc: The user curls up and boosts its Defense stat.

defog.name: Defog
defog.desc: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

destiny-bond.name: Destiny Bond
destiny-bond.desc: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the Pokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

detect.name: Detect
detect.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

diamond-storm.name: Diamond Storm
diamond-storm.desc: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply boost the user's Defense stat.

dig.name: Dig
dig.desc: The user burrows into the ground on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

dire-claw.name: Dire Claw
dire-claw.desc: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

disable.name: Disable
disable.desc: For four turns, the target will be unable to use whichever move it last used.

disarming-voice.name: Disarming Voice
disarming-voice.desc: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.desc: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also leave those hit by the attack with paralysis.

dive.name: Dive
dive.desc: The user dives on the first turn, then floats up and attacks on the next turn.

doodle.name: Doodle
doodle.desc: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

doom-desire.name: Doom Desire
doom-desire.desc: Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated bundle of light blasts the target.

double-hit.name: Double Hit
double-hit.desc: The user slams the target with a tail or the like. The target is hit twice in a row.

double-kick.name: Double Kick
double-kick.desc: The user attacks by kicking the target twice in a row using two feet.

double-shock.name: Double Shock
double-shock.desc: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

double-team.name: Double Team
double-team.desc: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to boost its evasiveness.

double-edge.name: Double-edge
double-edge.desc: A reckless life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

draco-meteor.name: Draco Meteor
draco-meteor.desc: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

dragon-ascent.name: Dragon Ascent
dragon-ascent.desc: The user attacks the target by dropping out of the sky at high speed. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

dragon-breath.name: Dragon Breath
dragon-breath.desc: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

dragon-cheer.name: Dragon Cheer
dragon-cheer.desc: The user raises its allies' morale with a draconic cry so that their future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits. This rouses Dragon types more.

dragon-claw.name: Dragon Claw
dragon-claw.desc: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws to inflict damage.

dragon-dance.name: Dragon Dance
dragon-dance.desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

dragon-darts.name: Dragon Darts
dragon-darts.desc: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two opposing Pokémon, this move hits each of them once.

dragon-energy.name: Dragon Energy
dragon-energy.desc: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

dragon-hammer.name: Dragon Hammer
dragon-hammer.desc: The user wields its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

dragon-pulse.name: Dragon Pulse
dragon-pulse.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

dragon-rush.name: Dragon Rush
dragon-rush.desc: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

dragon-tail.name: Dragon Tail
dragon-tail.desc: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

drain-punch.name: Drain Punch
drain-punch.desc: The user attacks with an energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

draining-kiss.name: Draining Kiss
draining-kiss.desc: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half the damage taken by the target.

dream-eater.name: Dream Eater
dream-eater.desc: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

drill-peck.name: Drill Peck
drill-peck.desc: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

drill-run.name: Drill Run
drill-run.desc: The user crashes into the target while rotating its body like a drill. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

drum-beating.name: Drum Beating
drum-beating.desc: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

dual-wingbeat.name: Dual Wingbeat
dual-wingbeat.desc: The user slams the target with its wings to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

dynamax-cannon.name: Dynamax Cannon
dynamax-cannon.desc: The user condenses energy within its body and unleashes that energy from its core to inflict damage.

dynamic-punch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamic-punch.desc: The user attacks by punching the target with full concentrated power. This also confuses the target.

earth-power.name: Earth Power
earth-power.desc: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.desc: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

echoed-voice.name: Echoed Voice
echoed-voice.desc: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used consecutively by any Pokémon, its power is boosted.

eerie-impulse.name: Eerie Impulse
eerie-impulse.desc: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

eerie-spell.name: Eerie Spell
eerie-spell.desc: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also drains 3 PP from the move last used by the target.

electric-terrain.name: Electric Terrain
electric-terrain.desc: The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground can no longer fall asleep.

electro-ball.name: Electro Ball
electro-ball.desc: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

electro-drift.name: Electro Drift
electro-drift.desc: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

electro-shot.name: Electro Shot
electro-shot.desc: The user gathers electricity on the first turn, boosting its Sp. Atk stat, then fires a high-voltage shot on the next turn. The shot will be fired immediately in rain.

electroweb.name: Electroweb
electroweb.desc: The user captures opposing Pokémon in an electric net to inflict damage. This also lowers their Speed stats.

ember.name: Ember
ember.desc: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

encore.name: Encore
encore.desc: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.desc: The user inflicts damage by cutting down the target's HP to roughly equal the user's HP.

endure.name: Endure
endure.desc: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. This move's chance of failing rises if used in succession.

energy-ball.name: Energy Ball
energy-ball.desc: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

entrainment.name: Entrainment
entrainment.desc: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

esper-wing.name: Esper Wing
esper-wing.desc: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also boosts the user's Speed stat. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

expanding-force.name: Expanding Force
expanding-force.desc: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. When the ground is Psychic Terrain, this move's power is boosted and it damages all opposing Pokémon.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

extrasensory.name: Extrasensory
extrasensory.desc: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

extreme-speed.name: Extreme Speed
extreme-speed.desc: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

facade.name: Facade
facade.desc: This move's power is doubled if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

fairy-lock.name: Fairy Lock
fairy-lock.desc: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

fairy-wind.name: Fairy Wind
fairy-wind.desc: The user attacks by stirring up a fairy wind to strike the target.

fake-out.name: Fake Out
fake-out.desc: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

fake-tears.name: Fake Tears
fake-tears.desc: The user feigns crying to fluster the target. This harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

false-surrender.name: False Surrender
false-surrender.desc: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

false-swipe.name: False Swipe
false-swipe.desc: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

feather-dance.name: Feather Dance
feather-dance.desc: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

feint.name: Feint
feint.desc: This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

fell-stinger.name: Fell Stinger
fell-stinger.desc: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat is boosted drastically.

fickle-beam.name: Fickle Beam
fickle-beam.desc: The user shoots a beam of light to inflict damage. Sometimes all the user's heads shoot beams in unison, doubling the move's power.

fiery-dance.name: Fiery Dance
fiery-dance.desc: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also boost the user's Sp. Atk stat.

fiery-wrath.name: Fiery Wrath
fiery-wrath.desc: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

fillet-away.name: Fillet Away
fillet-away.desc: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

final-gambit.name: Final Gambit
final-gambit.desc: The user risks everything to attack the target. The user faints but inflicts damage equal to its own HP.

fire-blast.name: Fire Blast
fire-blast.desc: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all- consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

fire-fang.name: Fire Fang
fire-fang.desc: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

fire-lash.name: Fire Lash
fire-lash.desc: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

fire-pledge.name: Fire Pledge
fire-pledge.desc: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast sea of fire appears.

fire-punch.name: Fire Punch
fire-punch.desc: The target is attacked with a fiery punch. This may also leave the target with a burn.

fire-spin.name: Fire Spin
fire-spin.desc: The user traps the target inside a fierce vortex of fire that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

first-impression.name: First Impression
first-impression.desc: Although this move has great power, it works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.desc: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

flail.name: Flail
flail.desc: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

flame-charge.name: Flame Charge
flame-charge.desc: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up momentum, the user boosts its Speed stat.

flame-wheel.name: Flame Wheel
flame-wheel.desc: The user attacks by cloaking itself in fire and charging at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.desc: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

flare-blitz.name: Flare Blitz
flare-blitz.desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with a burn.

flash-cannon.name: Flash Cannon
flash-cannon.desc: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.desc: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also boosts the target's Sp. Atk stat.

fleur-cannon.name: Fleur Cannon
fleur-cannon.desc: The user unleashes a strong beam. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

fling.name: Fling
fling.desc: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

flip-turn.name: Flip Turn
flip-turn.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

floral-healing.name: Floral Healing
floral-healing.desc: The user restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP. More HP is restored when the ground is Grassy Terrain.

flower-trick.name: Flower Trick
flower-trick.desc: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

fly.name: Fly
fly.desc: The user flies up into the sky on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

flying-press.name: Flying Press
flying-press.desc: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

focus-blast.name: Focus Blast
focus-blast.desc: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

focus-energy.name: Focus Energy
focus-energy.desc: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that its future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits.

focus-punch.name: Focus Punch
focus-punch.desc: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before using the move.

follow-me.name: Follow Me
follow-me.desc: The user draws attention to itself, making all opposing Pokémon take aim only at the user.

force-palm.name: Force Palm
force-palm.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

forests-curse.name: Forest's Curse
forests-curse.desc: The user puts a forest curse on the target. This adds Grass type to the target's type.

foul-play.name: Foul Play
foul-play.desc: The user turns the target's strength against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage this move inflicts.

freeze-shock.name: Freeze Shock
freeze-shock.desc: The turn after using this move, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

freeze-dry.name: Freeze-dry
freeze-dry.desc: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

freezing-glare.name: Freezing Glare
freezing-glare.desc: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

frenzy-plant.name: Frenzy Plant
frenzy-plant.desc: The user slams the target with the roots of an enormous tree. The user can't move on the next turn.

frost-breath.name: Frost Breath
frost-breath.desc: The user attacks by blowing its cold breath on the target. This move always lands a critical hit.

fury-attack.name: Fury Attack
fury-attack.desc: The user attacks by jabbing the target with a horn, a beak, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

fury-cutter.name: Fury Cutter
fury-cutter.desc: The user attacks by slashing the target with scythes, claws, or the like. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

fury-swipes.name: Fury Swipes
fury-swipes.desc: The user attacks by raking the target with claws, scythes, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

fusion-bolt.name: Fusion Bolt
fusion-bolt.desc: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move's power is boosted when influenced by an enormous flame.

fusion-flare.name: Fusion Flare
fusion-flare.desc: The user brings down a giant flame. This move's power is boosted when influenced by an enormous lightning bolt.

future-sight.name: Future Sight
future-sight.desc: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

gastro-acid.name: Gastro Acid
gastro-acid.desc: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

giga-drain.name: Giga Drain
giga-drain.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

giga-impact.name: Giga Impact
giga-impact.desc: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

gigaton-hammer.name: Gigaton Hammer
gigaton-hammer.desc: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

glacial-lance.name: Glacial Lance
glacial-lance.desc: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

glaciate.name: Glaciate
glaciate.desc: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Speed stats.

glaive-rush.name: Glaive Rush
glaive-rush.desc: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss and will inflict double damage until the user's next turn.

glare.name: Glare
glare.desc: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

grass-knot.name: Grass Knot
grass-knot.desc: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

grass-pledge.name: Grass Pledge
grass-pledge.desc: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast swamp appears.

grassy-glide.name: Grassy Glide
grassy-glide.desc: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

grassy-terrain.name: Grassy Terrain
grassy-terrain.desc: The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

grav-apple.name: Grav Apple
grav-apple.desc: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.desc: Enables Flying types or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves for five turns. Moves that involve flying can't be used.

growl.name: Growl
growl.desc: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

growth.name: Growth
growth.desc: The user's body grows all at once, boosting the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

guard-split.name: Guard Split
guard-split.desc: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

guard-swap.name: Guard Swap
guard-swap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.desc: A vicious tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

gunk-shot.name: Gunk Shot
gunk-shot.desc: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

gust.name: Gust
gust.desc: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

gyro-ball.name: Gyro Ball
gyro-ball.desc: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

hammer-arm.name: Hammer Arm
hammer-arm.desc: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Speed stat.

hard-press.name: Hard Press
hard-press.desc: The target is crushed with an arm, a claw, or the like to inflict damage. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

harden.name: Harden
harden.desc: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to boost its Defense stat.

haze.name: Haze
haze.desc: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

head-smash.name: Head Smash
head-smash.desc: The user attacks the target with a hazardous full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.desc: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

headlong-rush.name: Headlong Rush
headlong-rush.desc: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

heal-bell.name: Heal Bell
heal-bell.desc: The user makes a soothing bell chime to cure the status conditions of all its fellow party Pokémon and allies.

heal-pulse.name: Heal Pulse
heal-pulse.desc: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP.

healing-wish.name: Healing Wish
healing-wish.desc: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

heart-swap.name: Heart Swap
heart-swap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

heat-crash.name: Heat Crash
heat-crash.desc: The user slams into the target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

heat-wave.name: Heat Wave
heat-wave.desc: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on opposing Pokémon. This may also leave them with a burn.

heavy-slam.name: Heavy Slam
heavy-slam.desc: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

helping-hand.name: Helping Hand
helping-hand.desc: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

hex.name: Hex
hex.desc: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

high-horsepower.name: High Horsepower
high-horsepower.desc: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

high-jump-kick.name: High Jump Kick
high-jump-kick.desc: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

hone-claws.name: Hone Claws
hone-claws.desc: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

horn-attack.name: Horn Attack
horn-attack.desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

horn-drill.name: Horn Drill
horn-drill.desc: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

horn-leech.name: Horn Leech
horn-leech.desc: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

howl.name: Howl
howl.desc: The user howls loudly to rouse itself and its allies. This boosts their Attack stats.

hurricane.name: Hurricane
hurricane.desc: The user attacks by wrapping the target in a fierce wind. This may also confuse the target.

hydro-cannon.name: Hydro Cannon
hydro-cannon.desc: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can't move on the next turn.

hydro-pump.name: Hydro Pump
hydro-pump.desc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

hydro-steam.name: Hydro Steam
hydro-steam.desc: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.

hyper-beam.name: Hyper Beam
hyper-beam.desc: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

hyper-drill.name: Hyper Drill
hyper-drill.desc: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

hyper-voice.name: Hyper Voice
hyper-voice.desc: The user attacks by letting loose a horribly loud, resounding cry.

hyperspace-fury.name: Hyperspace Fury
hyperspace-fury.desc: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. This also lowers the user's Defense stat.

hyperspace-hole.name: Hyperspace Hole
hyperspace-hole.desc: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.desc: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall asleep.

ice-beam.name: Ice Beam
ice-beam.desc: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

ice-burn.name: Ice Burn
ice-burn.desc: The turn after using this move, the user surrounds the target with an ultracold, freezing wind to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with a burn.

ice-fang.name: Ice Fang
ice-fang.desc: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

ice-hammer.name: Ice Hammer
ice-hammer.desc: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Speed stat.

ice-punch.name: Ice Punch
ice-punch.desc: The target is attacked with an icy punch. This may also leave the target frozen.

ice-shard.name: Ice Shard
ice-shard.desc: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

ice-spinner.name: Ice Spinner
ice-spinner.desc: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

icicle-crash.name: Icicle Crash
icicle-crash.desc: The user attacks by crashing large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

icicle-spear.name: Icicle Spear
icicle-spear.desc: The user attacks by launching sharp icicles at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

icy-wind.name: Icy Wind
icy-wind.desc: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.desc: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

incinerate.name: Incinerate
incinerate.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

infernal-parade.name: Infernal Parade
infernal-parade.desc: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.desc: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.desc: The user lays roots that restore its own HP every turn. Because the user is now rooted, it can't switch out.

instruct.name: Instruct
instruct.desc: The user instructs the target to reuse the move last used by the target.

iron-defense.name: Iron Defense
iron-defense.desc: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

iron-head.name: Iron Head
iron-head.desc: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

iron-tail.name: Iron Tail
iron-tail.desc: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

ivy-cudgel.name: Ivy Cudgel
ivy-cudgel.desc: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

jaw-lock.name: Jaw Lock
jaw-lock.desc: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

jet-punch.name: Jet Punch
jet-punch.desc: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.desc: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move's type changes depending on the kind of plate held by the user.

jungle-healing.name: Jungle Healing
jungle-healing.desc: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

knock-off.name: Knock Off
knock-off.desc: The user slaps down the target's held item, making it unusable for that battle. This move does more damage if the target has a held item.

kowtow-cleave.name: Kowtow Cleave
kowtow-cleave.desc: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

lash-out.name: Lash Out
lash-out.desc: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's stats were lowered during this turn.

last-resort.name: Last Resort
last-resort.desc: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

last-respects.name: Last Respects
last-respects.desc: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

lava-plume.name: Lava Plume
lava-plume.desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

leaf-blade.name: Leaf Blade
leaf-blade.desc: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and cuts the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

leaf-storm.name: Leaf Storm
leaf-storm.desc: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

leafage.name: Leafage
leafage.desc: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

leech-life.name: Leech Life
leech-life.desc: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

leech-seed.name: Leech Seed
leech-seed.desc: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

leer.name: Leer
leer.desc: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

lick.name: Lick
lick.desc: The user licks the target with a long tongue to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

life-dew.name: Life Dew
life-dew.desc: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

light-screen.name: Light Screen
light-screen.desc: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special moves for five turns.

liquidation.name: Liquidation
liquidation.desc: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

lock-on.name: Lock-On
lock-on.desc: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the user's next move does not miss that target.

low-kick.name: Low Kick
low-kick.desc: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

low-sweep.name: Low Sweep
low-sweep.desc: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

lumina-crash.name: Lumina Crash
lumina-crash.desc: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

lunar-blessing.name: Lunar Blessing
lunar-blessing.desc: The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

lunar-dance.name: Lunar Dance
lunar-dance.desc: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP and PP restored and its status conditions cured.

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.desc: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

luster-purge.name: Luster Purge
luster-purge.desc: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

mach-punch.name: Mach Punch
mach-punch.desc: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

magic-powder.name: Magic Powder
magic-powder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target's type to Psychic.

magic-room.name: Magic Room
magic-room.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

magical-leaf.name: Magical Leaf
magical-leaf.desc: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

magma-storm.name: Magma Storm
magma-storm.desc: The user traps the target inside a maelstrom of fire that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

magnet-rise.name: Magnet Rise
magnet-rise.desc: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

magnetic-flux.name: Magnetic Flux
magnetic-flux.desc: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which boosts the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus Ability or the Minus Ability.

make-it-rain.name: Make It Rain
make-it-rain.desc: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

malignant-chain.name: Malignant Chain
malignant-chain.desc: The user pours toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

matcha-gotcha.name: Matcha Gotcha
matcha-gotcha.desc: The user fires a blast of tea that it mixed. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

mean-look.name: Mean Look
mean-look.desc: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

mega-drain.name: Mega Drain
mega-drain.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

mega-kick.name: Mega Kick
mega-kick.desc: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle- packed power.

mega-punch.name: Mega Punch
mega-punch.desc: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle- packed power.

megahorn.name: Megahorn
megahorn.desc: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

memento.name: Memento
memento.desc: The user faints. In return, the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats are harshly lowered.

metal-burst.name: Metal Burst
metal-burst.desc: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

metal-claw.name: Metal Claw
metal-claw.desc: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also boost the user's Attack stat.

metal-sound.name: Metal Sound
metal-sound.desc: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

meteor-beam.name: Meteor Beam
meteor-beam.desc: The user gathers energy from space and boosts its Sp. Atk stat on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

meteor-mash.name: Meteor Mash
meteor-mash.desc: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also boost the user's Attack stat.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.desc: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

mighty-cleave.name: Mighty Cleave
mighty-cleave.desc: The user wields the light that has accumulated atop its head to cleave the target. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

milk-drink.name: Milk Drink
milk-drink.desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.desc: The user copies the move last used by the target. The copied move can be used until the user of Mimic leaves the battle.

minimize.name: Minimize
minimize.desc: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply boosts its evasiveness.

mirror-coat.name: Mirror Coat
mirror-coat.desc: A retaliatory attack that counters any special move, inflicting double the damage taken.

mist-ball.name: Mist Ball
mist-ball.desc: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

mist.name: Mist
mist.desc: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

misty-explosion.name: Misty Explosion
misty-explosion.desc: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is boosted on Misty Terrain.

misty-terrain.name: Misty Terrain
misty-terrain.desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

moonblast.name: Moonblast
moonblast.desc: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moongeist-beam.name: Moongeist Beam
moongeist-beam.desc: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

morning-sun.name: Morning Sun
morning-sun.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

mortal-spin.name: Mortal Spin
mortal-spin.desc: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

mountain-gale.name: Mountain Gale
mountain-gale.desc: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage. This may also make the target flinch.

mud-shot.name: Mud Shot
mud-shot.desc: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

mud-slap.name: Mud-slap
mud-slap.desc: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

muddy-water.name: Muddy Water
muddy-water.desc: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

mystical-fire.name: Mystical Fire
mystical-fire.desc: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

mystical-power.name: Mystical Power
mystical-power.desc: The user attacks by emitting a mysterious power. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

nasty-plot.name: Nasty Plot
nasty-plot.desc: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

night-daze.name: Night Daze
night-daze.desc: The user looses a pitch-black shock wave at the target to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

night-shade.name: Night Shade
night-shade.desc: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

night-slash.name: Night Slash
night-slash.desc: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

no-retreat.name: No Retreat
no-retreat.desc: This move boosts all the user's stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

noble-roar.name: Noble Roar
noble-roar.desc: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
nuzzle.desc: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

order-up.name: Order Up
order-up.desc: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

origin-pulse.name: Origin Pulse
origin-pulse.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

overdrive.name: Overdrive
overdrive.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.desc: The user attacks the target with all its might. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

pain-split.name: Pain Split
pain-split.desc: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally splits the combined HP between the target and itself.

parabolic-charge.name: Parabolic Charge
parabolic-charge.desc: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

parting-shot.name: Parting Shot
parting-shot.desc: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

pay-day.name: Pay Day
pay-day.desc: Coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

payback.name: Payback
payback.desc: The user stores power, then attacks. This move's power is doubled if the user moves after the target.

peck.name: Peck
peck.desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn to inflict damage.

perish-song.name: Perish Song
perish-song.desc: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

petal-blizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petal-blizzard.desc: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and damages everything around it.

petal-dance.name: Petal Dance
petal-dance.desc: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

phantom-force.name: Phantom Force
phantom-force.desc: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

photon-geyser.name: Photon Geyser
photon-geyser.desc: The user attacks the target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat- whichever is higher for the user.

pin-missile.name: Pin Missile
pin-missile.desc: The user attacks by shooting sharp spikes at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

play-nice.name: Play Nice
play-nice.desc: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

play-rough.name: Play Rough
play-rough.desc: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

pluck.name: Pluck
pluck.desc: The user attacks by pecking the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

poison-fang.name: Poison Fang
poison-fang.desc: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

poison-gas.name: Poison Gas
poison-gas.desc: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the faces of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

poison-jab.name: Poison Jab
poison-jab.desc: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

poison-powder.name: Poison Powder
poison-powder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

poison-sting.name: Poison Sting
poison-sting.desc: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

poison-tail.name: Poison Tail
poison-tail.desc: The user hits the target with its tail. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also poison the target.

pollen-puff.name: Pollen Puff
pollen-puff.desc: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
poltergeist.desc: The user attacks by controlling the target's item. This move fails if the target isn't holding an item.

population-bomb.name: Population Bomb
population-bomb.desc: The user's fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

pounce.name: Pounce
pounce.desc: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

pound.name: Pound
pound.desc: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

powder-snow.name: Powder Snow
powder-snow.desc: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also leave opposing Pokémon frozen.

power-gem.name: Power Gem
power-gem.desc: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

power-split.name: Power Split
power-split.desc: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

power-swap.name: Power Swap
power-swap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

power-trick.name: Power Trick
power-trick.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

power-trip.name: Power Trip
power-trip.desc: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

power-whip.name: Power Whip
power-whip.desc: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to lash the target.

precipice-blades.name: Precipice Blades
precipice-blades.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

present.name: Present
present.desc: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. The gift restores HP sometimes, however.

prismatic-laser.name: Prismatic Laser
prismatic-laser.desc: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

protect.name: Protect
protect.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

psybeam.name: Psybeam
psybeam.desc: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also confuse the target.

psyblade.name: Psyblade
psyblade.desc: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.

psych-up.name: Psych Up
psych-up.desc: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

psychic-fangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychic-fangs.desc: The user attacks by biting the target with its psychic capabilities. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

psychic-noise.name: Psychic Noise
psychic-noise.desc: The user attacks the target with unpleasant sound waves. For two turns, the target is prevented from recovering HP through moves, Abilities, or held items.

psychic-terrain.name: Psychic Terrain
psychic-terrain.desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.desc: The target is hit with a strong telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

psycho-boost.name: Psycho Boost
psycho-boost.desc: The user attacks the target with all its might. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

psycho-cut.name: Psycho Cut
psycho-cut.desc: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

psyshield-bash.name: Psyshield Bash
psyshield-bash.desc: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This also boosts the user's Defense stat.

psyshock.name: Psyshock
psyshock.desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

psystrike.name: Psystrike
psystrike.desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

pyro-ball.name: Pyro Ball
pyro-ball.desc: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

quash.name: Quash
quash.desc: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

quick-attack.name: Quick Attack
quick-attack.desc: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

quick-guard.name: Quick Guard
quick-guard.desc: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

quiver-dance.name: Quiver Dance
quiver-dance.desc: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

rage-fist.name: Rage Fist
rage-fist.desc: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

rage-powder.name: Rage Powder
rage-powder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.

raging-bull.name: Raging Bull
raging-bull.desc: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

raging-fury.name: Raging Fury
raging-fury.desc: The user rampages around spewing flames for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

rain-dance.name: Rain Dance
rain-dance.desc: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type attacks. The rain also lowers the power of Fire-type attacks.

rapid-spin.name: Rapid Spin
rapid-spin.desc: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

razor-leaf.name: Razor Leaf
razor-leaf.desc: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

razor-shell.name: Razor Shell
razor-shell.desc: The user cuts the target with sharp shells to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: The user regenerates its cells, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.desc: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

reflect-type.name: Reflect Type
reflect-type.desc: The user reflects the target's type to become the same type as the target.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.desc: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical moves for five turns.

relic-song.name: Relic Song
relic-song.desc: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

rest.name: Rest
rest.desc: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and cures any status conditions.

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.desc: The user takes revenge for a fainted ally. This move's power is boosted if an ally fainted in the previous turn.

revelation-dance.name: Revelation Dance
revelation-dance.desc: The user attacks the target by dancing with all its might. This move becomes the same type as the user's type.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.desc: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

revival-blessing.name: Revival Blessing
revival-blessing.desc: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon's max HP.

rising-voltage.name: Rising Voltage
rising-voltage.desc: The user attacks with electricity rising from the ground. This move's power is doubled if the target is on Electric Terrain.

roar-of-time.name: Roar of Time
roar-of-time.desc: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can't move on the next turn.

roar.name: Roar
roar.desc: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

rock-blast.name: Rock Blast
rock-blast.desc: The user attacks by hurling hard rocks at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

rock-polish.name: Rock Polish
rock-polish.desc: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply boosts the user's Speed stat.

rock-slide.name: Rock Slide
rock-slide.desc: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

rock-smash.name: Rock Smash
rock-smash.desc: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

rock-throw.name: Rock Throw
rock-throw.desc: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to inflict damage.

rock-tomb.name: Rock Tomb
rock-tomb.desc: The user hurls boulders at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by cutting off its movement.

rock-wrecker.name: Rock Wrecker
rock-wrecker.desc: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

role-play.name: Role Play
role-play.desc: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's Ability.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.desc: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. This attack becomes more powerful each time it hits.

roost.name: Roost
roost.desc: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user's HP by up to half its max HP.

round.name: Round
round.desc: The user attacks the target with a song. If others use this move, they will act immediately after the initial user, and the power of their Rounds will be boosted.

ruination.name: Ruination
ruination.desc: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target's HP in half.

sacred-fire.name: Sacred Fire
sacred-fire.desc: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

sacred-sword.name: Sacred Sword
sacred-sword.desc: The user attacks by slicing with a sword. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.desc: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

salt-cure.name: Salt Cure
salt-cure.desc: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

sand-attack.name: Sand Attack
sand-attack.desc: Sand is hurled in the target's face, lowering the target's accuracy.

sand-tomb.name: Sand Tomb
sand-tomb.desc: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

sandsear-storm.name: Sandsear Storm
sandsear-storm.desc: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This may also leave them with a burn.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.desc: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to damage all Pokémon except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. The sandstorm also boosts the Sp. Def stats of Rock types.

scald.name: Scald
scald.desc: The user attacks by shooting boiling hot water at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

scale-shot.name: Scale Shot
scale-shot.desc: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

scary-face.name: Scary Face
scary-face.desc: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

scorching-sands.name: Scorching Sands
scorching-sands.desc: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.desc: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

screech.name: Screech
screech.desc: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

secret-sword.name: Secret Sword
secret-sword.desc: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn deals physical damage to the target.

seed-bomb.name: Seed Bomb
seed-bomb.desc: The user attacks by slamming a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

seed-flare.name: Seed Flare
seed-flare.desc: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack the target. This may also harshly lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

seismic-toss.name: Seismic Toss
seismic-toss.desc: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

self-destruct.name: Self-Destruct
self-destruct.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

shadow-ball.name: Shadow Ball
shadow-ball.desc: The user attacks by hurling a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

shadow-claw.name: Shadow Claw
shadow-claw.desc: The user attacks by slashing the target with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

shadow-force.name: Shadow Force
shadow-force.desc: The user disappears on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

shadow-punch.name: Shadow Punch
shadow-punch.desc: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

shadow-sneak.name: Shadow Sneak
shadow-sneak.desc: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

shed-tail.name: Shed Tail
shed-tail.desc: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

sheer-cold.name: Sheer Cold
sheer-cold.desc: The target faints instantly. This move is less likely to hit the target if used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

shell-side-arm.name: Shell Side Arm
shell-side-arm.desc: This move is either physical or special-whichever will inflict more damage. This may also poison the target.

shell-smash.name: Shell Smash
shell-smash.desc: The user breaks its shell, which lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

shelter.name: Shelter
shelter.desc: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

shift-gear.name: Shift Gear
shift-gear.desc: The user rotates its gears, boosting its Attack stat and sharply boosting its Speed stat.

shock-wave.name: Shock Wave
shock-wave.desc: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

shore-up.name: Shore Up
shore-up.desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP. It regains more HP in a sandstorm.

silk-trap.name: Silk Trap
silk-trap.desc: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

simple-beam.name: Simple Beam
simple-beam.desc: The user emits a mysterious psychic wave that changes the target's Ability to Simple.

sing.name: Sing
sing.desc: A soothing lullaby is sung in a beautiful voice that puts the target to sleep.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.desc: This move enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

skill-swap.name: Skill Swap
skill-swap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

skitter-smack.name: Skitter Smack
skitter-smack.desc: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

sky-attack.name: Sky Attack
sky-attack.desc: The user attacks the turn after using this move. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also make the target flinch.

slack-off.name: Slack Off
slack-off.desc: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

slam.name: Slam
slam.desc: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

slash.name: Slash
slash.desc: The target is attacked with a slash of claws, scythes, or the like. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

sleep-powder.name: Sleep Powder
sleep-powder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of soporific dust that puts the target to sleep.

sleep-talk.name: Sleep Talk
sleep-talk.desc: The user randomly uses one of the moves it knows. This move can only be used while the user is asleep.

sludge-bomb.name: Sludge Bomb
