sludge-bomb.desc: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

sludge-wave.name: Sludge Wave
sludge-wave.desc: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those it hits.

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.desc: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

smack-down.name: Smack Down
smack-down.desc: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. If the target is in the air, it will be knocked down to the ground.

smart-strike.name: Smart Strike
smart-strike.desc: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

smog.name: Smog
smog.desc: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.desc: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

snarl.name: Snarl
snarl.desc: The user yells as if it's ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.

snipe-shot.name: Snipe Shot
snipe-shot.desc: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

snore.name: Snore
snore.desc: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

snowscape.name: Snowscape
snowscape.desc: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

soak.name: Soak
soak.desc: The user shoots a torrent of water that changes the target's type to Water.

soft-boiled.name: Soft-Boiled
soft-boiled.desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

solar-beam.name: Solar Beam
solar-beam.desc: The user gathers light on the first turn, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

solar-blade.name: Solar Blade
solar-blade.desc: The user gathers light on the first turn, then fills a blade with the light's energy and attacks on the next turn.

spacial-rend.name: Spacial Rend
spacial-rend.desc: The user tears the target along with the space around it. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

spark.name: Spark
spark.desc: The user attacks the target with an electrically charged tackle. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

sparkling-aria.name: Sparkling Aria
sparkling-aria.desc: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be cured by the touch of these bubbles.

speed-swap.name: Speed Swap
speed-swap.desc: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

spicy-extract.name: Spicy Extract
spicy-extract.desc: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target's Attack stat and harshly lowering the target's Defense stat.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.desc: The user lays a trap of spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will damage opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

spiky-shield.name: Spiky Shield
spiky-shield.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.

spin-out.name: Spin Out
spin-out.desc: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

spirit-break.name: Spirit Break
spirit-break.desc: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

spirit-shackle.name: Spirit Shackle
spirit-shackle.desc: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from fleeing.

spit-up.name: Spit Up
spit-up.desc: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move's power.

spite.name: Spite
spite.desc: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

splash.name: Splash
splash.desc: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

spore.name: Spore
spore.desc: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

springtide-storm.name: Springtide Storm
springtide-storm.desc: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This may also lower their Attack stats.

stealth-rock.name: Stealth Rock
stealth-rock.desc: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap damages opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

steam-eruption.name: Steam Eruption
steam-eruption.desc: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

steel-beam.name: Steel Beam
steel-beam.desc: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

steel-roller.name: Steel Roller
steel-roller.desc: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails if the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

steel-wing.name: Steel Wing
steel-wing.desc: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also boost the user's Defense stat.

sticky-web.name: Sticky Web
sticky-web.desc: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.

stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.desc: The user stores power and boosts its Defense and Sp. Def stats. This move can be used up to three times.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.desc: The user attacks by stomping on the target with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

stomping-tantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stomping-tantrum.desc: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

stone-axe.name: Stone Axe
stone-axe.desc: The user swings its stone axes at the target. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.

stone-edge.name: Stone Edge
stone-edge.desc: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

stored-power.name: Stored Power
stored-power.desc: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

strange-steam.name: Strange Steam
strange-steam.desc: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

strength-sap.name: Strength Sap
strength-sap.desc: The user restores its own HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It then lowers the target's Attack stat.

strength.name: Strength
strength.desc: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

string-shot.name: String Shot
string-shot.desc: The user blows silk from its mouth that binds opposing Pokémon and harshly lowers their Speed stats.

struggle-bug.name: Struggle Bug
struggle-bug.desc: The user attacks by struggling against opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Sp. Atk stats.

stuff-cheeks.name: Stuff Cheeks
stuff-cheeks.desc: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply boosts its Defense stat.

stun-spore.name: Stun Spore
stun-spore.desc: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.desc: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its own HP. The substitute serves as the user's decoy.

sucker-punch.name: Sucker Punch
sucker-punch.desc: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

sunny-day.name: Sunny Day
sunny-day.desc: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type attacks. The sunlight also lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

sunsteel-strike.name: Sunsteel Strike
sunsteel-strike.desc: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

super-fang.name: Super Fang
super-fang.desc: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

supercell-slam.name: Supercell Slam
supercell-slam.desc: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.desc: The user attacks the target with great power. This also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

supersonic.name: Supersonic
supersonic.desc: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

surf.name: Surf
surf.desc: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

surging-strikes.name: Surging Strikes
surging-strikes.desc: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This move always lands a critical hit.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.desc: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply boosts the target's Attack stat.

swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.desc: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to restore its own HP. The more power is stored, the more HP is restored.

sweet-kiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweet-kiss.desc: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

sweet-scent.name: Sweet Scent
sweet-scent.desc: The user releases a scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.

swift.name: Swift
swift.desc: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.desc: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

swords-dance.name: Swords Dance
swords-dance.desc: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply boosts the user's Attack stat.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

syrup-bomb.name: Syrup Bomb
syrup-bomb.desc: The user sets off an explosion of sticky candy syrup, which coats the target and causes the target's Speed stat to drop each turn for three turns.

tachyon-cutter.name: Tachyon Cutter
tachyon-cutter.desc: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.desc: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

tail-glow.name: Tail Glow
tail-glow.desc: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically boosting its Sp. Atk stat.

tail-slap.name: Tail Slap
tail-slap.desc: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. This move hits two to five times in a row.

tail-whip.name: Tail Whip
tail-whip.desc: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Defense stats.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.desc: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the Speed stats of itself and its allies for four turns.

take-down.name: Take Down
take-down.desc: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

take-heart.name: Take Heart
take-heart.desc: The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions and boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

tar-shot.name: Tar Shot
tar-shot.desc: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.desc: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

tearful-look.name: Tearful Look
tearful-look.desc: The user gets teary-eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

teatime.name: Teatime
teatime.desc: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon currently in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

teeter-dance.name: Teeter Dance
teeter-dance.desc: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses every Pokémon around it.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

temper-flare.name: Temper Flare
temper-flare.desc: Spurred by desperation, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

tera-blast.name: Tera Blast
tera-blast.desc: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat-whichever is higher for the user.Stellar: Inflicts damage with the user's Attack or Sp. Atk stat- whichever is higher. Super effective against Terastallized targets. This lowers the user's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

tera-starstorm.name: Tera Starstorm
tera-starstorm.desc: With the power of its crystals, the user bombards and eliminates the target. When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.

terrain-pulse.name: Terrain Pulse
terrain-pulse.desc: The user utilizes the energy of the terrain to attack. This move's type and power change depending on the terrain at the time the move is used.

thief.name: Thief
thief.desc: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

throat-chop.name: Throat Chop
throat-chop.desc: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

thunder-cage.name: Thunder Cage
thunder-cage.desc: The user traps the target inside a cage of sparking electricity that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

thunder-fang.name: Thunder Fang
thunder-fang.desc: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

thunder-punch.name: Thunder Punch
thunder-punch.desc: The target is attacked with an electrified punch. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunder-shock.name: Thunder Shock
thunder-shock.desc: The user attacks the target with a jolt of electricity. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunder-wave.name: Thunder Wave
thunder-wave.desc: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.desc: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.desc: The user attacks the target with a strong electric blast. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

thunderclap.name: Thunderclap
thunderclap.desc: This move enables the user to attack first with a jolt of electricity. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

thunderous-kick.name: Thunderous Kick
thunderous-kick.desc: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

tickle.name: Tickle
tickle.desc: The user tickles the target into laughing, lowering its Attack and Defense stats.

tidy-up.name: Tidy Up
tidy-up.desc: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user's Attack and Speed stats.

topsy-turvy.name: Topsy-Turvy
topsy-turvy.desc: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

torch-song.name: Torch Song
torch-song.desc: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

torment.name: Torment
torment.desc: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

toxic-spikes.name: Toxic Spikes
toxic-spikes.desc: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

toxic-thread.name: Toxic Thread
toxic-thread.desc: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.desc: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

trailblaze.name: Trailblaze
trailblaze.desc: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

transform.name: Transform
transform.desc: The user transforms into a copy of the target, right down to having the same move set.

tri-attack.name: Tri Attack
tri-attack.desc: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

trick-room.name: Trick Room
trick-room.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

trick.name: Trick
trick.desc: The user catches the target off guard and swaps the target's held item with its own.

triple-arrows.name: Triple Arrows
triple-arrows.desc: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target's Defense stat or make it flinch.

triple-axel.name: Triple Axel
triple-axel.desc: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

triple-dive.name: Triple Dive
triple-dive.desc: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

triple-kick.name: Triple Kick
triple-kick.desc: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

trop-kick.name: Trop Kick
trop-kick.desc: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

twin-beam.name: Twin Beam
twin-beam.desc: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

twister.name: Twister
twister.desc: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

u-turn.name: U-turn
u-turn.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

upper-hand.name: Upper Hand
upper-hand.desc: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.

uproar.name: Uproar
uproar.desc: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

vacuum-wave.name: Vacuum Wave
vacuum-wave.desc: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

venoshock.name: Venoshock
venoshock.desc: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

victory-dance.name: Victory Dance
victory-dance.desc: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

vine-whip.name: Vine Whip
vine-whip.desc: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

vise-grip.name: Vise Grip
vise-grip.desc: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

volt-switch.name: Volt Switch
volt-switch.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

volt-tackle.name: Volt Tackle
volt-tackle.desc: The user electrifies itself and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with paralysis.

water-gun.name: Water Gun
water-gun.desc: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

water-pledge.name: Water Pledge
water-pledge.desc: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a rainbow appears.

water-pulse.name: Water Pulse
water-pulse.desc: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

water-shuriken.name: Water Shuriken
water-shuriken.desc: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

water-spout.name: Water Spout
water-spout.desc: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

waterfall.name: Waterfall
waterfall.desc: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

wave-crash.name: Wave Crash
wave-crash.desc: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

weather-ball.name: Weather Ball
weather-ball.desc: This move's type and power change depending on the weather at the time the move is used.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.desc: The user traps the target inside a violent, swirling whirlpool that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.desc: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

wicked-blow.name: Wicked Blow
wicked-blow.desc: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

wide-guard.name: Wide Guard
wide-guard.desc: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

wild-charge.name: Wild Charge
wild-charge.desc: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into the target. This also damages the user a little.

wildbolt-storm.name: Wildbolt Storm
wildbolt-storm.desc: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

will-o-wisp.name: Will-o-wisp
will-o-wisp.desc: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

wing-attack.name: Wing Attack
wing-attack.desc: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

wish.name: Wish
wish.desc: One turn after this move is used, the user's or its replacement's HP is restored by up to half the user's max HP.

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.desc: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, boosting its Defense stat.

wonder-room.name: Wonder Room
wonder-room.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

wood-hammer.name: Wood Hammer
wood-hammer.desc: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

work-up.name: Work Up
work-up.desc: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted.

worry-seed.name: Worry Seed
worry-seed.desc: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.desc: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

x-scissor.name: X-scissor
x-scissor.desc: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes, claws, or the like as if they were a pair of scissors.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.desc: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

zap-cannon.name: Zap Cannon
zap-cannon.desc: The user attacks by firing an electric blast like a cannon. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

zen-headbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
zen-headbutt.desc: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

zing-zap.name: Zing Zap
zing-zap.desc: The user crashes into the target, delivering a powerful electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.
